title: Delaware Department of Justice Update on Attorney General Beau Biden | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 12, 2010

 



Delaware Department of Justice Update on Attorney General Beau Biden




Attorney General Biden continues his favorable progress after sustaining a mild stroke yesterday. He will continue to follow standard protocol and receive medical therapy over the coming days, as is typical for any patient recovering from an event like this.
He looks forward to returning to his duties as Attorney General in the near future.
